title: Here's a list of 20 articles on retrieval-based language models up to 2023. These articles cover various aspects of retrieval-based models, including their architecture, applications, and advancements
**"Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering"** - Karpukhin et al
Retrieval-Augmented Language Model Pre-Training"** - Guu et al
Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Knowledge-Intensive NLP Tasks"**
Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT"**
**"T5: Exploring the Limits of Transfer Learning with a Unified Text-to-Text Transformer"**
Unsupervised Dense Information Retrieval with Contrastive Learning"** - Izacard et al
**"FiD: A Simple and Effective Baseline for Retrieval-Augmented Generation"**
**"Learning Dense Representations for Retrieval with Hard Negatives"** - Xiong et al
**"GTR: A General Framework for Retrieval-based Text Generation"** - Zhang et al
**"BEIR: A Heterogeneous Benchmark for Zero-shot Evaluation of Information Retrieval Models"**
**"Prompting for Retrieval-Augmented Language Models"** - Liu et al
**"Dense Retrieval as a Pre-Training Task for Large Language Models"**
**"Retro: Retrieval-Enhanced Transformer for Open-Domain Question Answering"** - Borgeaud et al
**"Improving Passage Retrieval with Zero-Shot Question Generation"** - Piktus et al
**"Unifying Vision-and-Language Tasks via Text Generation"** - Cho et al
**"Efficient Retrieval Augmented Generation from Unstructured Knowledge for Task-Oriented Dialog"**
**"Knowledge-Intensive Language Understanding with Pre-Trained Retrieval Models"** - Petroni et al

author.literal: **"Multi-Stage Document Ranking with BERT"** - Nogueira et al.

title: **"Pre-trained Language Models for Information Retrieval: A Brief Review"**
**"Exploring the Limits of Transfer Learning with a Unified Text-to-Text Transformer"**
